room_title: Escape room "The Laboratory" by Puzzled Escape in Brighton
review: We booked the Laboratory room for my birthday party. We had 10 people trying to help figure everything out so it was challenging. Thankfully, the staff helped us when we struggled and we had a blast!The props and rooms are excellent. The hidden room gave it an extra bonus of adventure! Thank you so much for a wonderful night and great memories... we will be back for sure!

room_title: Escape room "The Laboratory" by Puzzled Escape in Brighton
review: What a great time. The Laboratory was so much fun and the clues were very unique and well thought out. Staff was great and I would recommend that folks visit Puzzled Escape for some challenging fun.

room_title: Escape room "The Laboratory" by Puzzled Escape in Brighton
review: A well-scripted story backing up challenging and interesting puzzles all embedded in a room with decent production value and superior puzzle mechanics. My family and I highly enjoyed the room, including my daughter who works in an escape room and has visited more than thirty of them.

room_title: Escape room "The Laboratory" by Puzzled Escape in Brighton
review: Where do I even begin? This place is awesome! Super cool, down to earth ownership and staff. You might escape but you'll be dying to go back! Can't wait until I go again and can try all of the rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Laboratory" by Puzzled Escape in Brighton
review: I can't say enough good things about Puzzled Escape. We've done two rooms now, and the puzzles are challenging enough for adults but enjoyable for our teens as well. The rooms are very well done and full of surprises - the Laboratory's twist is awesome! The staff is extremely friendly and remembered us from our first visit months ago. We'll definitely be back for the third room and cheerfully recommend Puzzled Escape to anyone looking for a fun time with family or friends.
